channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 天然气和电力生产商 Eneva 希望通过从巴西国家电力公司（Eletrobras）购买热电厂并与燃料分销商 Vibra Energia 合并，在巴西实现增长
item.description:
Natural gas and power producer Eneva is looking to grow in Brazil by purchasing thermal plants from Eletrobras and merging with fuel distributor Vibra Energia https://t.co/8R9vZGH6iu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 在政府加大力度挽救陷入困境的市场之后，中国房价的跌势在 2 月份略有缓解。
item.description:
China’s home-price declines eased slightly in February, after authorities stepped up efforts to salvage the beleaguered market. https://t.co/88qgSbdeGs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 中国央行维持关键政策利率不变，并从银行系统抽走现金，延续了滴灌式刺激政策的做法
item.description:
China’s central bank left its key policy rate unchanged and drained cash from the banking system, extending its approach of drip-feed stimulus https://t.co/W5zgnAInCx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 菲律宾销售额最大的房地产开发商正在销售更昂贵的住宅，以提高其利润率，因为较高的利率挤压了不太富裕的买家。
item.description:
Philippines’ largest property developer by sales is selling more expensive homes to boost its bottom line as higher interest rates squeeze its less affluent buyers. https://t.co/QKWQUHCatl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 美国驻华最高外交官抨击中国政府反对美国可能禁止 TikTok 的做法，"我觉得这极具讽刺意味，因为这里的政府官员正在利用 X 平台批评美国"。
item.description:
“I find it supremely ironic because government officials here are using the X platform to criticize the United States”

The top American diplomat in China hit out at Beijing’s objection to a potential ban on TikTok in the US https://t.co/X4A0IhpV3B pic.twitter.com/tM0bkfyVOD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚博彩公司 Tabcorp 首席执行官因在工作场所使用攻击性和不恰当语言而突然辞职，导致该公司股价暴跌。
item.description:
Tabcorp shares slumped after the Australian gaming company’s CEO abruptly resigned after using offensive and inappropriate language in the workplace https://t.co/cm38cotZi2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 区块链平台贝拉链（Berachain）在一轮 6,900 万美元的融资中成为独角兽，这标志着风险资本对加密交易的胃口正在恢复
item.description:
Blockchain platform Berachain is becoming a unicorn in a $69 million funding round that signals recovering venture capital appetite for crypto deals https://t.co/w4NlXLtAP3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）表示，本月晚些时候发布的新西兰官方经济增长预测将描绘出一幅黯淡的经济前景图。
item.description:
New Zealand’s official growth forecasts will paint a gloomy picture of the economic outlook when they are released later this month, Finance Minister Nicola Willis says https://t.co/DudfqwXZRL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 独家：美国计划向三星提供超过 60 亿美元的资金，帮助这家芯片制造商在其已宣布的德克萨斯州项目之外进行扩张
item.description:
EXCLUSIVE: The US plans to award more than $6 billion to Samsung, helping the chipmaker expand beyond a project in Texas it has already announced https://t.co/mgJk4qOdjo

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 一项研究发现，随着商界领袖对日益严重的不安全状况表示担忧，货物失窃正在抬高墨西哥的杂货价格。
item.description:
Cargo theft is raising grocery prices in Mexico as business leaders express concerns over growing insecurity, a study found. https://t.co/9Vvqu8xbdk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 一个议会委员会发现，英国政府旨在振兴贫困地区的旗舰项目 "提升水平 "承诺被 "惊人的拖延 "所困扰
item.description:
The UK government’s flagship “levelling up” pledge to revitalize disadvantaged regions has been beset by “astonishing delays," a parliamentary committee found https://t.co/6Q5GF4DOMD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 日本最大的工会组织将公布数十年来最受关注的工资数据--这些数据可能会促使日本央行自 2007 年以来首次加息
item.description:
Japan’s largest union group will release the most closely scrutinized wage figures in decades — numbers that may nudge the BOJ toward raising interest rates for the first time since 2007 https://t.co/siknB7koUw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 在日本央行召开会议之前，从贝莱德到曼氏集团的基金经理们都采取了这些策略，这次会议可能会结束世界上最后一次负利率试验。
item.description:
These are the strategies of money managers from BlackRock to Man Group ahead of a BOJ meeting that may end the world’s last experiment with negative interest rates https://t.co/9y1W3AaBHp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 今年年初，中国的经济活动可能喜忧参半，令人怀疑中国是否有能力实现约 5%的雄心勃勃的增长目标。
item.description:
China’s economic activity was likely mixed at the start of the year, raising doubts about the nation’s ability to hit an ambitious growth target of around 5% https://t.co/8IvVmDBKLt

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 根据 3 月份的一项民意调查，墨西哥执政党总统候选人克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）领先其主要反对党对手科希特尔-加尔韦斯（Xochitl Galvez）19 个百分点。
item.description:
Mexico’s ruling party candidate for the presidency, Claudia Sheinbaum, is ahead of her main opposition rival Xochitl Galvez by 19 percentage points, according to a March poll. https://t.co/Q1kWn8Fgpf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: #5Things：交易员对美联储前景摇摆不定。经济学家担忧中国一年期借贷成本下降。一则关于日本负利率即将结束的报道令日元岌岌可危。市场动态如下
item.description:
#5Things: Traders waver on Fed outlook. Economists brace for lower one-year borrowing costs in China. A report that Japan’s negative rates are poised to end roils the yen. Here’s what’s moving markets https://t.co/BANF0EdezG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 本期 "埃隆公司 "播客直播在 2024 年 SXSW 大会上录制，我们将讨论埃隆-马斯克迁居德克萨斯州对该州以及马斯克本人产生的影响。
item.description:
On this live episode of the Elon, Inc. podcast, recorded at SXSW 2024, we talk about how Elon Musk's move to Texas has impacted the state — and Musk himself https://t.co/05VZEaFuBF pic.twitter.com/91p4l5W6Ui

item.title: Tabcorp 首席执行官在任职不到两年后辞职。在今天的《澳大利亚简报》（Australia Briefing）中，您将阅读到更多来自本地区和其他地区的彭博资讯。
item.description:

item.title: 美国工厂通胀升温，零售销售逊于预期，国债收益率上升

item.title: 本周末，这位自斯大林以来在位时间最长的俄罗斯领导人必将再次赢得总统任期，而此时乌克兰的战局正朝着对他有利的方向发展。西方的分裂进一步推动了他的野心
item.description:
Russia’s longest-serving leader since Stalin is certain to win another term as president this weekend just as the war in Ukraine turns in his favor. Divisions in the West give further impetus to his ambitions https://t.co/lMU7ri3c9m

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024
